item.title: seminars and talks
item.description: seminars and invited talks A composite indicator for circular economy performance - ISI 2023: International Statistical Institute World Statistics Congress (2023 - Ottawa, Canada) Convex Clustering for mixed data - DSSV-ECDA 2023: Joint conference of Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation and the European Conference on Data Analysis (2023 - Antwerp, Belgium) Mixed Data Convex Clustering - CMStatistics 2022: 15th International Conference of the ERCIM WG on Computational and Methodological Statistics (2022 - London, UK - Virtual)
